Its actually very weird how sated devourer currently interacts with azir. 

 (copied from : http://leagueoflegends.wikia.com/wiki/Sated_Devourer_)

[Azir's "Phantom Hit" will not duplicate his soldier's attacks, but will cause him to perform a damageless attack against his target concurrently his soldier's attack - allowing him to apply on-hit effects.

    This will NOT occur if his target is out of his personal attack range.
    The number of soldiers does NOT affect how many times on-hit effects are applied.
    The on-hit effects will only occur versus his attack target - they will NOT be applied to all enemies damaged.
    For example: Your soldiers are dealing 200 damage per strike, every other strike will also have a 60 damage tick from Sated Devourer (as well as damage from effects such as Nashor's Tooth item.png Nashor's Tooth and Arcane Blade mastery s4.png Arcane Blade.]


So basically, right now (patch 5.16) azir can proc on hit effects like nashors, statikk shiv with his soldiers ( i tested it) BUT can apply the extra 60 damage on phantom  hit in one soldier and also does not apply twice the on hit effect. thats reaaaaaaaaaly weird. Now riot makes azir apply the extra 60 damage on ALL soldiers meaning you would get max 180 damage  from 3 soldiers at the second autoattack, but NOT proc on hit effects anymore like nashors.
Does anyone else notice that one soldier on the bottom is out of sync with the others and with Azir?
